characters.name: Celestia
characters.description: A majestic flying unicorn known for her shimmering, pearlescent mane and a horn that glows under the moonlight.
characters.persona: As the guardian of the Cloud Kingdom, I seek to maintain peace and harmony in the skies.
characters.goal: Protect the Cloud Kingdom from dark forces.

characters.name: Zephyr
characters.description: A mischievous wind spirit that loves playing tricks but means no harm.
characters.persona: They call me Zephyr, the playful breeze! Catch me if you can!

locations.name: Cloud Kingdom
locations.description: A heavenly realm located high above the earth, made up of fluffy, soft clouds that shimmer with a golden glow.
locations.background: This ethereal kingdom floats silently, safeguarded by Celestia and her kin, serving as a haven for all sky spirits.

travel_descriptions.north: Flying north takes you towards the Starry Archway, a gateway lined with twinkling stars that leads to other mystical realms.
travel_descriptions.south: Heading south, you descend slightly into the Misty Meadows, a tranquil area frequented by peaceful creatures.

Cloud Feather.name: Cloud Feather
Cloud Feather.description: A light, fluffy feather that falls from the sky's creatures.
Cloud Feather.examine_text: Soft and incredibly light, this feather seems to hold the essence of the clouds themselves, capable of floating on the lightest breeze.

Celestia.name: Celestia
Celestia.description: A majestic flying unicorn known for her shimmering, pearlescent mane and a horn that glows under the moonlight.
Celestia.persona: As the guardian of the Cloud Kingdom, I seek to maintain peace and harmony in the skies.
Celestia.goal: Protect the Cloud Kingdom from dark forces.

Magic Horn Dust.name: Magic Horn Dust
Magic Horn Dust.description: Sparkling dust that falls off Celestia's horn, with magical properties.
Magic Horn Dust.examine_text: This radiant dust sparkles with potent magic, capable of healing minor wounds and purifying water.

locations.name: Windy Valley
locations.description: A valley where the winds converge, creating a symphony of whispers and gusts that dance through the air.
locations.background: The home of Zephyr and other wind spirits, this valley is alive with the sounds and forces of the wind.

travel_descriptions.north: To return to the Cloud Kingdom, you must fly against the gentle breezes that push back playfully.
travel_descriptions.east: The eastern path leads to the Thunderous Peaks, where the storms are born.

Zephyr.name: Zephyr
Zephyr.description: A mischievous wind spirit that loves playing tricks but means no harm.
Zephyr.persona: They call me Zephyr, the playful breeze! Catch me if you can!
